arg.option: [% IF EXPRESSION %] block [% ELSE %] block [% END %]
[% SWITCH EXPRESSION %][% CASE EXPRESSION %] block [% CASE EXPRESSION %] block [% END %]

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: A simple templating language to format the notification notice.
A tag with just a VARIABLE name or optionala a get in frot of will be replaced with the environment variable of the same name. If prepended with URL the string will be url encoded.
The IF construct will show only one of the blocks. ELSE and the second block can be ommitet.
The SWITCH construct will show only the block following a CASE statement which match with the expression of the SWITCH.
[%- and -%] remove the linefeed befor/after the statement.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLE
refsect1.programlisting: [% HOSTNAME %] [% IF EDITOR -%] You editor is: [% EDITOR %] [% END %]
